consensus.delegation: How to stake and delegate your tokens?
consensus.delegationDescription: The Oasis Network is a proof-of-stake network. This means that the voting power of an entity in the network is determined by the amount of tokens staked to that entity.
consensus.description: Oasis Core is designed around the principle of modularity. The consensus layer is an interface that provides a number of important services to other parts of Oasis Core.
consensus.manageRose: How to manage your ROSE tokens?
consensus.manageRoseDescription: You can transfer tokens from your account to another...
consensus.nodeDescription: Anyone can run a node - learn about the pre-requisites.
consensus.tokenomicsDescription: At the heart of the Oasis network is its native ecosystem token: ROSE.
consensus.validatorsDescription: Each node operator directly contributes to increasing the Oasis Network’s decentralization.

emerald.description: The Emerald ParaTime is our official EVM Compatible ParaTime providing smart contract environment with full EVM compatibility.
emerald.gatewayDescription: To get started building on our Emerald ParaTime, you can use our public Web3 gateway, fully compatible with Ethereum's Web3 gateway.

sapphire.description: The Sapphire ParaTime is our official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment with EVM compatibility.

hardhat.header: Add the {{ layer }} Testnet to Hardhat
hardhat.description: Open up your hardhat.config.ts and drop in these lines.

1.description: The Pontus-X Network is our official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime offering a smart contract development environment that is compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) focused on building a Federated Data Economy.

2.description: The Devnet for Pontus-X may undergo frequent version upgrades.

3.header: Adding the Pontus-X Devnet to Hardhat
3.description: To integrate with Pontus-X devnet, open your hardhat.config.ts file and insert the following configurations.

1.description: The Pontus-X Network is our official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime offering a smart contract development environment that is compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) focused on building a Federated Data Economy.

2.description: The Testnet for Pontus-X may undergo frequent version upgrades.

3.header: Adding the Pontus-X Testnet to Hardhat
3.description: To integrate with Pontus-X testnet, open your hardhat.config.ts file and insert the following configurations.

token.description: Rose is the currency powering the Oasis network.

testnet.description: The Testnet may be subject to frequent version upgrades.

localnet.description: Convenient development and testing of your dApps.

tools.description: Oasis integrates with a number of services and provides tooling support for developers.

transfer.header: How to Transfer ROSE into a ParaTime?
transfer.description: Rose is the currency powering the {{layer}} network.

social.description: Build trustless apps with ROFL. Use pre-built templates and manage from a single interface.
social.community: Be part of the community and stay in the loop on everything Oasis
social.roseAppDescription: Quickest way into the Oasis Ecosystem. Easily discover, stake, move, buy or wrap ROSE.

testnetFaucet.description: Drops are limited to 150 TEST tokens

tokens.emptyInventory: Token has no inventory associated with it.
tokens.emptyTokenHolderList: There are no holders on record for this token.

transaction.startedDescription: {{ method }} has started, final result will be known in the next block
transaction.warningMultipleTransactionsSameHash: Please make sure you're looking at the right transaction. There is more than one transaction with this hash, which is extremely rare. We are showing the most recent successful one.

currentFiatValue.title: Current fiat value
currentFiatValue.explanation: This figure is calculated using the current rate. The value at the time of transaction might have been different.

layerPicker.consensus: The consensus layer is a scalable, high-throughput, secure, proof-of-stake consensus run by a decentralized set of validator nodes.
layerPicker.description: Select the network and layer you want to explore.
layerPicker.readMore: Read more about {{ layer }} on {{ network }} in Oasis Docs

mainnet.emerald: The Emerald ParaTime is our official EVM Compatible ParaTime providing smart contract environment with full EVM compatibility.
mainnet.sapphire: The Sapphire ParaTime is our official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment with EVM compatibility.

testnet.emerald: The Testnet of the EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment.
testnet.sapphire: The Testnet of the official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment with EVM compatibility.
testnet.pontusxdev: The Devnet of Pontus-X, a confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime offering a smart contract development environment that is compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) focused on building a Federated Data Economy.
testnet.pontusxtest: The Testnet of Pontus-X, a confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime offering a smart contract development environment that is compatible with the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) focused on building a Federated Data Economy.

localnet.emerald: The Localnet of the EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment.
localnet.sapphire: The Localnet of the official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment with EVM compatibility.

home.userOffline: You are offline. We’re trying to reconnect.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.sapphire: Oasis main EVM-compatible chain. Supports encrypted contract state and end-to-end encrypted transactions and calls.
ecosystem.consensus: Oasis Layer 1 chain providing scalable, high-throughput, secure, proof-of-stake consensus run by a decentralized set of validator nodes.
ecosystem.pontusx: Confidential EVM-Compatible chain offering smart contract development environment focused on building Decentralized data economy.
ecosystem.emerald: Oasis original EVM-compatible chain launched in 2021. Superseded by Oasis Sapphire which supports confidential state and encrypted transactions.
ecosystem.deltaDAODescription: DeltaDAO forms the foundation for the AI & Data economy of tomorrow.
ecosystem.visitSite: Visit their site for more info
ecosystem.legacyTooltip: New EVM dApps and contracts should be deployed on Sapphire.

testTokens.description: Do you need some tokens for testing?

rofl.author: Author

endorsementLabels.any: Any node can endorse the enclave
endorsementLabels.role_compute: Node has the compute role for the current runtime
endorsementLabels.role_observer: Node has the observer role for the current runtime

rofl.metadataInfo: This info provided by deployer, Oasis does not verify this information.
rofl.rakAbbreviationTooltip: Runtime Attestation Key generated inside each runtime replica for enclave attestation.
rofl.rekAbbreviationTooltip: Runtime Encryption Key generated inside each runtime replica for encrypting cross-runtime messages.
rofl.secretsTooltip: These secrets are end-to-end encrypted and can only be read by the app running in ROFL.
rofl.sekPublicKeyTooltip: Secrets Encryption Key for encrypting user secrets and generating the keys.

search.placeholder: Address, Block, Contract, Transaction hash, Token name, etc.

error.tooShort: Please enter either at least 3 characters or a number in order to perform a search.
error.privacy:
It seems like you might accidentally entered a keyphrase for a wallet. Please note that your mnemonic is a secret key that should never be shared, even not with our {{ appName }}.
Executing this search is highly unlikely to return any results.
